doc:
Andrew Dice Clay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Dice_Clay 0 Andrew Dice Clay (born Andrew Clay Silverstein; September 29, 1957) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, musician, and producer. He rose to prominence in the late 1980s with a brash, macho, offensive persona known as "The Diceman". In 1990, he became the first stand-up comedian to sell out Madison Square Garden for two consecutive nights. That same year, he played the lead role in the comedy-mystery film The Adventures of Ford Fairlane.Clay has appeared in several films and television shows and released a number of stand-up comedy albums. He continues to focus on acting while still touring and performing stand-up. He launched his new podcast, I'm Ova Hea' Now, in September 2018. Andrew_Dice_Clay ( born Andrew_Clay_Silverstein ; September_29_,_1957 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , musician , and producer . He rose to prominence in the_late_1980s with a_brash_,_macho_,_offensive_persona known as " The_Diceman_" . In 1990 , he became the_first_stand-up_comedian to_sell out Madison_Square_Garden for two_consecutive_nights . That_same_year , he played the_lead_role in the_comedy-mystery_film The_Adventures of Ford_Fairlane.Clay has_appeared in several_films_and_television_shows and released a_number of stand-up_comedy_albums . He continues_to_focus on acting while still touring_and_performing stand-up . He launched his_new_podcast , I 'm Ova_Hea ' Now , in September_2018 .
